scripts.development:frontend: docker-compose --profile development up -d && docker-compose logs -f frontend
scripts.development:backend: docker-compose --profile development up -d && docker-compose logs -f backend
scripts.build:production: yarn workspace @team-10/frontend run production && mv packages/frontend/build packages/backend/public || move packages/frontend/build packages/backend/public && docker-compose --env-file .env.production --profile production build
scripts.build:common: docker build -t keonwoo/cs492c:default -f Dockerfile.workflow . && docker push keonwoo/cs492c:default
